greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of connected set-systems covering n vertices.
comment: Unlike the nearly identical sequence A092918, this sequence does not count under a(1) the a single-vertex hypergraph with no edges.
maple: a:= proc(n) option remember; b(n)-`if`(n=0, 0, add(
xref: Cf. A001187, A003465 (not necessarily connected), A016031, A048143, A092918, A293510, A317672, A323816, A323817 (no singletons), A323819 (unlabeled case).
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, Jan 30 2019
